page.title: 05CROWN WOOD COMMUNITY CENTRE.
page.content:
There is a{Community Centre}very near to our school at Crown Wood. It is used a in lot of different ways. A{Play Group}for 3 and 4 year olds meets there each morning. Sometimes in the afternoons there is a{Toddlers' {Group}or some entertainment for people over 60. Sometimes there is a{Youth } {Group}and football and games clubs. The{Brownies}meet there once a week.
There is a{Bar}open some lunchtimes, in the evenings and at weekends.
We sent out a simple{questionnaire } to the parents of children at our School about the Community Centre and a summary of the results is given on the next page.
